page.title: 13Recreation in Stoke
page.content: In Stoke there are not many sports facilities. The Michelin factory has sports facilities for its workers and their families.They include a running track, squash and badminton courts and a multigym. There is one place open to the public,Booth Street,in Stoke.This building has one large hall,some smaller rooms, two squash courts and a small shooting range.The hall is used for 5 a side football,gymnastics, badminton and basketball. One of the rooms is used as a multigym. For outside sports there is a playing field called the Croft.Some schools without their own fields,use this field for football,hockey and Sports Days.The Croft has its own showers.Opposite Springfields School there is King George V Playing fields.
